metadata.title: CVE-2012-6709 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
ELinks 0.12 and Twibright Links 2.3 have Missing SSL CertificateValidation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elinks - 0.13~20190125-3ubuntu1
elinks-data - 0.13~20190125-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elinks package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13~20190125-3ubuntu1').
